module.name: DAHDi Config
module.changelog: *13.0.6* Fixes FREEPBX-10941 and FREEPBX-10859 *13.0.5* Remove old bin scripts *13.0.4* Detect and parse WanRouter configurations correctly *13.0.3* Send error output to dev/null *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Fix auto-start for DAHDi *13.0.1alpha2* Update visuals *13.0.1alpha1* Use new console framework for startup *2.11.47* Visual Cleanup *2.11.46* Attempt to fix some errors in javascript *2.11.45* Fix all the bugs. Yes I am trying! Also allow resetting of groups if needed per span (FREEPBX-7381) and FREEPBX-7051 *2.11.44* Wrong channel count bug. Argh *2.11.43* Fix channel range for Analog T1 and add echocan info *2.11.42* FREEPBX-7437 Fix sangoma module bug *2.11.41* Add license info *2.11.40* Database abstraction layer fixes *2.11.39* Just remove the notice all together. Its too confusing. *2.11.38* Resolve outstanding wanpipe global.conf issues *2.11.37* #7142 fixes Sangoma dual selection modes which were confusing and diverged *2.11.36* Putting the fix within the foreach loop would probably help *2.11.35* Only force set hardhdlc on sangoma cards everthing else shold be automatic *2.11.34* Added support for FXS digital channels to support Rhino CB-24 Channel Banks *2.11.33* Fixes #7111, Change dchan= to be hardhdlc= *2.11.32* Fixes #6628, Dont run dahdi_cfg on retrieve_conf *2.11.31* Packaging of ver 2.11.31 *2.11.30* Packaging of ver 2.11.30 *2.11.29* Russian language support *2.11.28* Dont depend on modprobe to give accurate information *2.11.27* Fixes: #6963, #6955, #6962, #6961, #6960, #6959, #6351, #6797, #6921, #6742, #6919 *2.11.26* Remove symlinked hook file on uninstall *2.11.25* Allow editing and sorting of DAHDi Modules File Directly *2.11.24.1* #6585, #6461, #6583 *2.11.24* Fixes #6583, Add txgain and rxgain per digital card. *2.11.23* Fixes Lanuage Name #6442 *2.11.22* Fixes #6434, #6438, #6361 Add many more languages (not all are tested). Fixed issue of resetting data on module upgrade. *2.11.21* Fixes #6434,#6436 (only show fwringer of module is wctdm) added italian re #6361 *2.11.20* Fixes #6420 dont allow usage of fwringdetect in 2.6.0 and greater *2.11.19* Add sangoma GSM card control and setup *2.11.18* Fixes #6329 and random Insert fatal *2.11.17* Fixes #6346, dont try to write to sangoma config if we set the option to no (default) *2.11.16* Fixes #6329 and random Insert fatal *2.11.15* Fixes #6289, also allows users to define the location of dahdi and dahdi configuration files *2.11.14* With help from [sr] Fixes #6244 and also fixes #6247 *2.11.11* Fix #6281, #6269. Work on BRI re #6244 *2.11.9* Protect End Users Configuration Files *2.11.8* Sangoma Support *2.11.7* Fixed modprobe overwrite issue and space after equals *2.11.6* Moshe skinin' *2.11.5* Remove mac extra atts...again *2.11.4* Finished modprobe additional custom entries and cleanup *2.11.3* Fix up restarting issues and General Settings additional Settings *2.11.2* Add to extended repo *2.11.1.8* Fixes #4409 *2.11.1.5* Fixes #4558, #4837, #5005, #5256
